list.abstract: Confirmation，英文单词，名词，作名词时意为“确认；证实；证明；批准”。

yingyinNormal.en: A Supreme Court confirmation in the middle of an election?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大选期间确认最高法院提名？

yingyinNormal.en: Something, unfortunately, that might upset Diane's confirmation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不幸的是，有些事实可能会对戴安的职位确认不利。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me lock in that trade right now and get back to you with my secretary with an exact confirmation. Sound good, John?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这就去把这笔交易定下来再让我秘书和你进一步确认，可以吧，John？

yingyinNormal.en: Honey. Dad, you hit "Place order" once, and then you wait for the confirmation. I'm sorry. Don't be sorry! Be smart!
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的。爸爸，你点一下“提交订单”，然后等着确认。抱歉。别抱歉！聪明点！

yingyinNormal.en: Excellent choice! Kevin. Let me lock in that trade right now and get back to you in a few minutes with an exact confirmation, Kevin. And welcome to Stratton Oakmont.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好极了，Kevin我这就去下单马上再回来和你确认，欢迎加入斯奥投资。

yingyinNormal.en: We have no confirmation but we believe FN-2187 may have helped in the escape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然还未经证实，但我们怀疑是FN-2187协助了他逃离。

yingyinNormal.en: Your coming will be a rather confirmation, surely if indeed such a report exists.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果外界真有这种流言，那么你赶到这反而会弄假成真。

yingyinNormal.en: Now that Sacks has confirmation that you are alive, I fear they will bring the fight to us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在萨克斯知道了你们都还活着，恐怕他们会找我们麻烦的。

yingyinNormal.en: No, because I had to ask for your help in the first place. That I couldn't get the confirmation on my own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是因为我还得向你求助，凭我自己没法拿下提名。

yingyinNormal.en: We've been told the gunman was killed, as well as at least one Secret Service agent, but we don't have definitive confirmation of that yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 已得知枪手已被击毙，另有至少一名特勤人员遇难，但我们还未得到明确证实。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
